page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: This is a very old farm dating from Roman times and it was it was mentioned in the Domesday Book.One part of the house is 14 century.The farm is also 14 century. The farm is 350 acres,mostly down to arable with some grazing for sheep. They no longer keep cows because of financial difficulties. They grow barley and wheat-310 acres, and rape-39 acres,in rolation. One man alone farms the Blounts Farm Land and looks after the the machinery. There are 2 tractors and 1 combine harvester. Major Thorne does all the administration, he has been farming for 35 years. Even though growing crops he has kept all his hedges and only removed wire fences.
